Translations.Text: (o muham'mad!) Emi? Memu ni koraku ni hrdayanni teruvaleda
mariyu memu ni bharanni ni pai nundi dinci veyaleda
edaite ni vennunu virustu undindo
mariyu ni peru pratisthanu paikettaleda
niscayanga, ellappudu kastanto patu sukham kuda untundi
niscayanga, kastanto patu sukham kuda untundi
kavuna niku tirika labhincinappudu aradhanalo nimagnudavaipo
mariyu ni prabhuvu nande dhyanam nilupu
anjuram (attipandu) mariyu jaitun saksiga
sinay (tur) konda saksiga
i santi nagaram (makka) saksiga
vastavanga! Memu manavudini sarvasresthamaina akaranlo srstincamu
taruvata memu atanni digajarci adhamati - adhamamaina sthitiki marcamu
kani visvasinci, satkaryalu cesevaru tappa! Endukante alanti variki antuleni pratiphalam undi
ayite (o manavuda!) Dini taruvata kuda nivu enduku pratiphaladinanni tiraskaristunnavu
emi? Allah n'yayadhipatulalokella sarvottama n'yayadhipati kada
caduvu! Ni prabhuvu peruto, ayane (sarvanni) srstincadu
ayane manavunni raktamuddato (jivakananto) srstincadu
caduvu! Mariyu ni prabhuvu paramadata
ayana kalam dvara nerpadu
manavudu erugani jnananni ataniki bodhincadu
Ala kadu! Vastavaniki, manavudu talabirusutananto pravartistadu
endukante, atadu tananu tanu nirapeksaparudiga bhavistadu
niscayanga ni prabhuvu vaipunake (andariki) marali povalasi undi
nivu nirodhince vyaktini cusava
namaj cese (allah) dasunni
okavela atanu (muham'mad!) Sanmargampai unte ni abhiprayamemiti
inka, daivabhitini gurinci adesistu unte
okavela (a nirodhince) vadu satyanni tiraskarincevadu mariyu sanmargam nundi vimukhudayyevadaite
vastavaniki, allah anta custunnadani ataniki teliyada
ala kadu! Okavela atadu manukokapote, memu atadini, nuduti juttu ventrukalanu patti idustamu
adi abad'dhalalo, aparadhalalo munigivunna nuduru
ayite, atanni tana anucarulanu pilucukomanu
memu kuda naraka dutalanu pilustamu
ala kadu! Nivu atani mata vinaku mariyu ayane (allah ke) sastangam (sajda) ceyyi mariyu ayana (allah) sannidhyanni pondataniki prayatnincu
niscayanga, memu dinini (i khur'an nu) ghanatagala a ratri (al khadar)lo avatarimpajesamu
mariyu a ghanata gala ratri ante emito nikem telusu
a ghanata gala ratri veyi nelala kante sresthamainadi
a ratrilo devadutalu mariyu atma (jibril), tama prabhuvu anumatito, prati vyavaharaniki sambandhincina) ajnalu tisukuni digi vastaru
a ratrilo tellavare varaku santi vardhillutundi
entavarakaite spastamaina nidarsanam rado! Anta varaku satyatiraskarulaina purvagrantha prajalu mariyu bahudaivaradhakulu (tama satyatiraskaranni) manukunevaru karu
allah taraphu nundi vaccina sandesaharudu, variki pavitra grantha putalanu vinipistunnadu
andulo samanjasamaina vratalu (satyopadesalu) unnayi
Mariyu spastamaina sucana vaccina tarvatane grantha prajalu bhedabhiprayalalo paddaru

mariyu varikiccina adesam: "Varu allah ne aradhincalani, purti ekagra cittanto tama dharmanni (bhaktini) kevalam ayana korake pratyekincukovalani, namaj nu sthapincalani mariyu jakat ivvalani. Ide saraina dharmamu
niscayanga, satyatiraskarulaina grantha prajalu mariyu bahudaivaradhakulu narakagniloki potaru. Varandulo sasvatanga untaru. Ilanti vare, srstilo atyanta nikrsta jivulu
niscayanga, visvasinci satkaryalu cesevaru, vare srstilo atyanta utkrsta jivulu

variki tama prabhuvu nundi labhince pratiphalam sasvatamaina svargavanalu. Vatilo krinda selayellu pravahistu untayi. Varu, vatilo sasvatanga kalakalamuntaru. Allah varito prasannudavutadu mariyu varu ayanato santustulavutaru. Ide tana prabhuvuku bhayapade vyaktiki labhince pratiphalam
bhumi tana ati tivramaina (antima) bhukampanto kampimpajeyabadinappudu
mariyu bhumi tana bharannanta tisi bayata pada vesinappudu
mariyu manavudu: "Diniki emayindi?" Ani annappudu
a roju adi tana samacaralanu vivaristundi
endukante, ni prabhuvu danini adesinci untadu
a roju prajalu tama tama karmalu cupincabadataniki ververu gumpulalo veltaru
appudu, prativadu tanu, ravvanta (paramanuvanta) mancini cesi unna, danini cusukuntadu
mariyu alage, prativadu tanu ravvanta (paramanuvanta) cedunu cesi unna, danini cusukuntadu
vagarcutu parigette gurrala saksiga
tama khurala tattulato agnikanalu lepevati
tellavarujhamuna dadi cesevati
(meghala vanti) dum'mu leputu
(satruvula) samuhanlo duripoye vati
niscayanga, manavudu tana prabhuvu patla ento krtaghnudu
Mariyu niscayanga, diniki svayanga atade saksi
mariyu niscayanga, atadu sirisampadala vyamohanlo purtiga munigi unnadu
